If there is a dispute among the heirs either as to the facts or the application of law, the court shall adjourn the probate hearing and refer the parties to a law suit or an administrative procedure in the following cases:
if there is a dispute among the heirs as to whether a particular item of property belongs to the estate;
if there is a dispute among the decedent's descendants regarding a demand on the part of the decedent's descendants who lived in the same household as the decedent that a portion corresponding to their contribution to the increase in or the preservation of the value of the decedent's property be excluded from the estate.
